attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is bizarre in the extreme that Red Arrows joyriding should be funded from the public purse yet Air Ambulances across the UK are reliant on public generosity to provide a vital service.

If people wish to see this luxury continue they should be allowed to contribute from their own pockets. If the Red Arrows are a symbol of excellence for British industry then those companies that believe they will benefit should contribute to the cost - not the taxpayer.

If the pilots maintain an operational commitment they should be paid by the MoD. If the aircraft have no operational function then they should be privately funded.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
